backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing validated contact form submissions in a map with auto-incremented IDs and a query to list all forms.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing portfolio image enhancements, fallback handling, and configuration locations tied to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across the React/Tailwind portfolio app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark variables, and applying base background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling all portfolio sections with refs for scroll navigation and smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying logo, navigation links, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/GradientCTAButto: Gradient-styled CTA button extending shadcn Button props with animated hover effects.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioProject: Image component supporting external URLs with loading spinner, error fallback, and optional crossOrigin handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an about section with text, an image, and a CTA button that smooth-scrolls to the services section.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClientR: Displays a grid of client result images and a CTA that smooth-scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via mutation, and contact info cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a hero banner with headline, description, background decorations, and a CTA that scrolls to contact.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Displays a portfolio of solar marketing projects with images and performance metrics, plus a CTA to contact.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists service offerings with icons and descriptions and includes a CTA button that scrolls to the portfolio section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Shows client testimonials in cards with avatars and a CTA that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/SectionShell.tsx: Reusable wrapper providing section spacing, container layout, optional title, and gradient accent bar.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with active-section tracking, smooth scrolling, logo button, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state handling and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for submitting a contact form through an actor and invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode theming, and utility classes for the app.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s current state, requirements, architectural notes, issues, and planned features for the SolviroStudio portfolio site.
